title: How to Make an Announcement System in Roblox Studio (Grow A Garden)
description: A complete announcement system for your Roblox game
content:
# Roblox Announcement System

This is a **comprehensive announcement system** for Roblox games that allows administrators to broadcast messages to all players in real-time.

## Features

- Real-time announcements
- Admin-only controls
- Customizable styling
- Sound effects support
- Multiple announcement types

## Video Tutorial

Watch this tutorial to learn how to implement the system:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dQw4w9WgXcQ

## Installation

1. Download the system files
2. Import into Roblox Studio
3. Configure the settings
4. Test with your admin commands

## Code Example

```lua
local AnnouncementService = require(script.AnnouncementService)

-- Send announcement to all players
AnnouncementService:SendAnnouncement({
    title = "Server Update",
    message = "New features have been added!",
    type = "info",
    duration = 10
})
```

*Perfect for any Roblox game requiring player communication!*
